expectedText: Perform Epley maneuver today. Provide vestibular exercises handout. Follow up in 2 weeks if symptoms persist. Consider audiology referral if no improvement.
allowedVariations: Perform Epley maneuver today. Provide vestibular exercises handout. Follow up in two weeks if symptoms persist.
Epley maneuver today. Vestibular exercises handout. Follow up in 2 weeks. Audiology referral if no improvement.
